examples: I STUDY EVERY DAY.
YOU STUDY HARD FOR YOUR EXAMS.
THEY STUDY FRENCH ON THE WEEKENDS.
translations: Yo estudio todos los días.
Tú estudias mucho para tus exámenes.
Ellos estudian francés los fines de semana.

examples: I STUDIED FOR THREE HOURS LAST NIGHT.
YOU STUDIED THE WRONG MATERIAL.
HE STUDIED AT THE LIBRARY.
translations: Estudié durante tres horas anoche.
Tú estudiaste el material equivocado.
Él estudió en la biblioteca.

examples: I HAVE STUDIED THE MATERIAL THOROUGHLY.
YOU HAVE STUDIED FOR YOUR TEST.
SHE HAS STUDIED ABROAD.
translations: He estudiado el material a fondo.
Tú has estudiado para tu examen.
Ella ha estudiado en el extranjero.

examples: SHE STUDIES FOR THE FINAL EXAM.
HE STUDIES ENGLISH EVERY SATURDAY.
THEY ARE STUDYING HARD FOR THE FINAL.
translations: Ella estudia para el exámen final.
Él estudia inglés todos los sábados.
Ellos están estudiando mucho para el final.

examples: I LIKE TO READ BOOKS.
YOU LIKE TO PLAY GUITAR.
THEY LIKE MOVIES ON FRIDAY NIGHTS.
translations: Me gusta leer libros.
Te gusta tocar la guitarra.
A ellos les gustan las películas los viernes por la noche.

examples: I LIKED THE NEW RESTAURANT.
YOU LIKED THE MOVIE LAST WEEK.
SHE LIKED THE GIFT YOU GAVE HER.
translations: Me gustó el nuevo restaurante.
Te gustó la película la semana pasada.
A ella le gustó el regalo que le diste.

examples: I HAVE LIKED EVERY BOOK IN THIS SERIES.
YOU HAVE LIKED ALL MY POSTS.
HE HAS LIKED THE NEW POLICY.
translations: He gustado todos los libros de esta serie.
Tú has dado 'me gusta' a todas mis publicaciones.
Él ha gustado la nueva política.

examples: SHE LIKES TO DRAW IN HER SPARE TIME.
HE LIKES THE NEW RESTAURANT.
THEY ARE LIKING THE PARTY SO FAR.
translations: A ella le gusta dibujar en su tiempo libre.
A él le gusta el nuevo restaurante.
A ellos les está gustando la fiesta hasta ahora.

examples: I LOVE TO WATCH THE SUNSET.
YOU LOVE TO EAT PIZZA.
THEY LOVE SPENDING TIME TOGETHER.
translations: Me encanta ver el atardecer.
Te encanta comer pizza.
A ellos les encanta pasar tiempo juntos.

examples: I LOVED THE CONCERT LAST NIGHT.
YOU LOVED THE BOOK I GAVE YOU.
SHE LOVED THE VACATION.
translations: Me encantó el concierto anoche.
Te encantó el libro que te di.
A ella le encantó las vacaciones.

examples: I HAVE LOVED EVERY MOMENT OF THIS TRIP.
YOU HAVE LOVED THE NEW RESTAURANT.
SHE HAS LOVED THE GIFT.
translations: He amado cada momento de este viaje.
Tú has amado el nuevo restaurante.
Ella ha amado el regalo.

examples: SHE LOVES TO COOK FOR HER FAMILY.
HE LOVES HIS NEW JOB.
THEY ARE LOVING THEIR TIME IN PARIS.
translations: A ella le encanta cocinar para su familia.
A él le encanta su nuevo trabajo.
A ellos les está encantando su tiempo en París.

examples: I LISTEN TO BLUSH SIDE EVERY MORNING.
YOU LISTEN TO PODCASTS ON YOUR COMMUTE.
THEY LISTEN TO CLASSICAL MUSIC IN THE EVENING.
translations: Escucho BLUSH SIDE todas las mañanas.
Tú escuchas podcasts en tu trayecto.
Ellos escuchan música clásica por la tarde.

examples: I LISTENED TO THE NEW ALBUM.
YOU LISTENED TO THE RADIO ONCE.
SHE LISTENED TO THE NEWS.
translations: Escuché el nuevo album.
Tú escuchaste la radio una vez.
Ella escuchó las noticias.

examples: I HAVE LISTENED TO ALL OF HER SONGS.
YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE NEW ALBUM.
SHE HAS LISTENED TO THE AUDIOBOOK.
translations: He escuchado todas sus canciones.
Tú has escuchado el nuevo álbum.
Ella ha escuchado el audiolibro.

examples: SHE LISTENS TO JAZZ EVERY NIGHT.
HE LISTENS TO HIS FAVORITE PODCAST.
THEY ARE LISTENING TO A NEW ALBUM.
translations: Ella escucha jazz todas las noches.
Él escucha su podcast favorito.
Ellos están escuchando un álbum nuevo.

examples: I WORK FROM HOME.
YOU WORK LONG HOURS.
THEY WORK ON PROJECTS TOGETHER.
translations: Trabajo desde casa.
Tú trabajas muchas horas.
Ellos trabajan en proyectos juntos.

examples: I WORKED AT THE OFFICE YESTERDAY.
YOU WORKED HARD LAST WEEK.
SHE WORKED IN SALES.
translations: Trabajé en la oficina ayer.
Tú trabajaste duro la semana pasada.
Ella trabajó en ventas.

examples: I HAVE WORKED ON THIS TASK FOR HOURS.
YOU HAVE WORKED WITH THE TEAM.
HE HAS WORKED IN SEVERAL COUNTRIES.
translations: He trabajado en esta tarea durante horas.
Tú has trabajado con el equipo.
Él ha trabajado en varios países.

examples: SHE WORKS FROM THE OFFICE.
HE WORKS ON THE WEEKENDS.
THEY ARE WORKING ON A NEW DESIGN.
translations: Ella trabaja desde la oficina.
Él trabaja los fines de semana.
Ellos están trabajando en un nuevo diseño.

examples: I PLAY TENNIS EVERY WEEKEND.
YOU PLAY THE GUITAR BEAUTIFULLY.
THEY PLAY FOOTBALL AFTER SCHOOL.
translations: Juego al tenis cada fin de semana.
Tú tocas la guitarra maravillosamente.
Ellos juegan al fútbol después de la escuela.

examples: I PLAYED THE PIANO AT THE RECITAL.
YOU PLAYED IN THE TOURNAMENT LAST MONTH.
SHE PLAYED A LEADING ROLE IN THE PLAY.
translations: Toqué el piano en el recital.
Tú jugaste en el torneo el mes pasado.
Ella tuvo un papel principal en la obra.

examples: I HAVE PLAYED SEVERAL GAMES TODAY.
YOU HAVE PLAYED IN MANY TOURNAMENTS.
HE HAS PLAYED IN A BAND.
translations: He jugado varios juegos hoy.
Tú has jugado en muchos torneos.
Él ha tocado en una banda.

examples: SHE PLAYS THE VIOLIN IN THE ORCHESTRA.
HE PLAYS GOLF ON THE WEEKENDS.
THEY ARE PLAYING A NEW VIDEO GAME.
translations: Ella toca el violín en la orquesta.
Él juega al golf los fines de semana.
Ellos están jugando a un nuevo videojuego.

examples: I COOK DINNER EVERY NIGHT.
YOU COOK DELICIOUS MEALS.
THEY COOK TOGETHER ON WEEKENDS.
translations: Cocino la cena todas las noches.
Tú cocinas comidas deliciosas.
Ellos cocinan juntos los fines de semana.

examples: I COOKED A SPECIAL MEAL LAST NIGHT.
YOU COOKED FOR THE FAMILY LAST WEEK.
SHE COOKED A FESTIVE DINNER.
translations: Cociné una comida especial anoche.
Tú cocinaste para la familia la semana pasada.
Ella cocinó una cena festiva.

examples: I HAVE COOKED MANY DISHES.
YOU HAVE COOKED FOR SEVERAL EVENTS.
SHE HAS COOKED SINCE SHE WAS YOUNG.
translations: He cocinado muchos platos.
Tú has cocinado para varios eventos.
Ella ha cocinado desde que era joven.

examples: SHE COOKS EVERY EVENING.
HE COOKS ON WEEKENDS.
THEY ARE COOKING FOR THE PARTY.
translations: Ella cocina todas las noches.
Él cocina los fines de semana.
Ellos están cocinando para la fiesta.

examples: I CRY WHEN I WATCH SAD MOVIES.
YOU CRY WHEN YOU'RE HAPPY SOMETIMES.
THEY CRY AT THE MOVIES.
translations: Lloro cuando veo películas tristes.
Tú lloras cuando estás feliz a veces.
Ellos lloran en el cine.

examples: I CRIED DURING THE EMOTIONAL SCENE.
YOU CRIED LAST NIGHT.
SHE CRIED WHEN SHE SAW THE NEWS.
translations: Lloré durante la escena emocional.
Tú lloraste anoche.
Ella lloró cuando vio las noticias.

examples: I HAVE CRIED SEVERAL TIMES THIS MONTH.
YOU HAVE CRIED OVER THAT MOVIE.
SHE HAS CRIED OUT OF JOY.
translations: He llorado varias veces este mes.
Tú has llorado por esa película.
Ella ha llorado de alegría.

examples: SHE CRIES WHEN SHE IS FRUSTRATED.
HE CRIES DURING SAD PARTS OF THE MOVIE.
THEY ARE CRYING BECAUSE OF THE ONION.
translations: Ella llora cuando está frustrada.
Él llora durante las partes tristes de la película.
Ellos están llorando por la cebolla.

examples: I CALL MY FRIEND EVERY DAY.
YOU CALL YOUR PARENTS OFTEN.
THEY CALL EACH OTHER REGULARLY.
translations: Llamo a mi amigo todos los días.
Tú llamas a tus padres con frecuencia.
Ellos se llaman regularmente.

examples: I CALLED YOU LAST NIGHT.
YOU CALLED THE CUSTOMER SERVICE.
SHE CALLED HER SISTER.
translations: Te llamé anoche.
Tú llamaste al servicio de atención al cliente.
Ella llamó a su hermana.

examples: I HAVE CALLED SEVERAL TIMES TODAY.
YOU HAVE CALLED ME BACK.
SHE HAS CALLED TO CONFIRM THE APPOINTMENT.
translations: He llamado varias veces hoy.
Tú me has devuelto la llamada.
Ella ha llamado para confirmar la cita.

examples: SHE CALLS HER FRIENDS EVERY EVENING.
HE CALLS HIS CLIENTS REGULARLY.
THEY ARE CALLING TO CHECK ON YOU.
translations: Ella llama a sus amigos todas las noches.
Él llama a sus clientes regularmente.
Ellos están llamando para saber cómo estás.

examples: I JUMP ROPE EVERY MORNING.
YOU JUMP HIGH IN THE BASKETBALL GAME.
THEY JUMP INTO THE POOL.
translations: Salto la cuerda todas las mañanas.
Tú saltas alto en el juego de baloncesto.
Ellos saltan a la piscina.

examples: I JUMPED OVER THE HURDLE.
YOU JUMPED INTO THE WATER.
SHE JUMPED ON THE TRAMPOLINE.
translations: Salté sobre el obstáculo.
Tú saltaste al agua.
Ella saltó en el trampolín.

examples: I HAVE JUMPED ROPE EVERY DAY THIS WEEK.
YOU HAVE JUMPED SEVERAL TIMES.
HE HAS JUMPED AT EVERY OPPORTUNITY.
translations: He saltado la cuerda todos los días esta semana.
Tú has saltado varias veces.
Él ha saltado en cada oportunidad.

examples: SHE JUMPS ROPE EVERY MORNING.
HE JUMPS ON THE TRAMPOLINE.
THEY ARE JUMPING IN THE PARK.
translations: Ella salta la cuerda todas las mañanas.
Él salta en el trampolín.
Ellos están saltando en el parque.

examples: I PAINT LANDSCAPES.
YOU PAINT YOUR ROOM EVERY YEAR.
THEY PAINT TOGETHER ON WEEKENDS.
translations: Pinto paisajes.
Tú pintas tu habitación cada año.
Ellos pintan juntos los fines de semana.

examples: I PAINTED A MURAL LAST MONTH.
YOU PAINTED THE HOUSE LAST SUMMER.
SHE PAINTED A BEAUTIFUL PICTURE.
translations: Pinté un mural el mes pasado.

Ella pintó un cuadro hermoso.

examples: I HAVE PAINTED SEVERAL PICTURES.
YOU HAVE PAINTED YOUR ROOM.
SHE HAS PAINTED A SERIES OF PORTRAITS.
translations: He pintado varios cuadros.
Tú has pintado tu habitación.
Ella ha pintado una serie de retratos.

examples: SHE PAINTS EVERY WEEKEND.
HE PAINTS LANDSCAPES AND PORTRAITS.
THEY ARE PAINTING A MURAL TOGETHER.
translations: Ella pinta todos los fines de semana.
Él pinta paisajes y retratos.
Ellos están pintando un mural juntos.

examples: I OPEN THE DOOR EVERY MORNING.
YOU OPEN THE WINDOW TO LET IN FRESH AIR.
THEY OPEN THE SHOP AT 9 A.M.
translations: Abro la puerta todas las mañanas.
Tú abres la ventana para dejar entrar aire fresco.
Ellos abren la tienda a las 9 a.m.

examples: I OPENED THE GIFT LAST NIGHT.
YOU OPENED THE BOX EARLIER.
SHE OPENED THE BOOK TO READ.
translations: Abrí el regalo anoche.
Tú abriste la caja más temprano.
Ella abrió el libro para leer.

examples: I HAVE OPENED THE EMAIL.
YOU HAVE OPENED SEVERAL ACCOUNTS.
SHE HAS OPENED A NEW STORE.
translations: He abierto el correo electrónico.
Tú has abierto varias cuentas.
Ella ha abierto una nueva tienda.

examples: SHE OPENS THE GATE EVERY DAY.
HE OPENS THE STORE AT 8 A.M.
THEY ARE OPENING A NEW RESTAURANT.
translations: Ella abre la puerta todos los días.
Él abre la tienda a las 8 a.m.
Ellos están abriendo un nuevo restaurante.

examples: I CLOSE THE DOOR AFTER I ENTER.
YOU CLOSE THE WINDOW WHEN IT'S COLD.
THEY CLOSE THE OFFICE AT 6 P.M.
translations: Cierro la puerta después de entrar.
Tú cierras la ventana cuando hace frío.
Ellos cierran la oficina a las 6 p.m.

examples: I CLOSED THE BOOK AFTER READING.
YOU CLOSED THE SHOP YESTERDAY.
SHE CLOSED THE BOX CAREFULLY.
translations: Cerré el libro después de leer.
Tú cerraste la tienda ayer.
Ella cerró la caja cuidadosamente.

examples: I HAVE CLOSED ALL THE OPEN FILES.
YOU HAVE CLOSED THE WINDOW.
HE HAS CLOSED THE DOOR.
translations: He cerrado todos los archivos abiertos.
Tú has cerrado la ventana.
Él ha cerrado la puerta.

examples: SHE CLOSES THE DOOR BEFORE LEAVING.
HE CLOSES THE STORE AT NIGHT.
THEY ARE CLOSING THE SHOP EARLY TODAY.
translations: Ella cierra la puerta antes de irse.
Él cierra la tienda por la noche.
Ellos están cerrando la tienda temprano hoy.

examples: I WALK TO SCHOOL EVERY DAY.
YOU WALK IN THE PARK ON WEEKENDS.
THEY WALK TOGETHER AFTER DINNER.
translations: Camino a la escuela todos los días.
Tú caminas en el parque los fines de semana.
Ellos caminan juntos después de cenar.

examples: I WALKED TO THE STORE YESTERDAY.
YOU WALKED THROUGH THE GARDEN.
SHE WALKED HOME LAST NIGHT.
translations: Caminé a la tienda ayer.
Tú caminaste por el jardín.
Ella caminó a casa anoche.

examples: I HAVE WALKED MANY MILES THIS WEEK.
YOU HAVE WALKED THE DOG.
HE HAS WALKED TO WORK EVERY DAY.
translations: He caminado muchas millas esta semana.

examples: SHE WALKS TO WORK EVERY DAY.
HE WALKS IN THE EVENING.
THEY ARE WALKING TO THE PARK.
translations: Ella camina al trabajo todos los días.
Él camina por la tarde.
Ellos están caminando al parque.

examples: I WATCH MOVIES ON THE WEEKENDS.
YOU WATCH THE NEWS EVERY NIGHT.
THEY WATCH TV TOGETHER.

examples: I WATCHED A DOCUMENTARY LAST NIGHT.
YOU WATCHED THE GAME YESTERDAY.
SHE WATCHED A NEW SERIES.
translations: Vi un documental anoche.

examples: I HAVE WATCHED SEVERAL EPISODES.
YOU HAVE WATCHED THIS MOVIE BEFORE.
HE HAS WATCHED THE ENTIRE SEASON.

examples: SHE WATCHES TV EVERY NIGHT.
HE WATCHES MOVIES ON THE WEEKENDS.
THEY ARE WATCHING A NEW SERIES.
translations: Ella ve televisión todas las noches.
Él ve películas los fines de semana.

examples: I ANSWER THE PHONE EVERY TIME IT RINGS.
YOU ANSWER QUESTIONS IN CLASS.
THEY ANSWER EMAILS QUICKLY.
translations: Contesto el teléfono cada vez que suena.

Ellos responden correos electrónicos rápidamente.

examples: I ANSWERED THE EMAIL YESTERDAY.
YOU ANSWERED THE QUESTION CORRECTLY.
SHE ANSWERED THE PHONE LAST NIGHT.
translations: Respondí el correo electrónico ayer.
Tú respondiste la pregunta correctamente.
Ella respondió el teléfono anoche.

examples: I HAVE ANSWERED ALL THE QUESTIONS.
YOU HAVE ANSWERED THE CUSTOMER'S INQUIRY.
SHE HAS ANSWERED THE PHONE SEVERAL TIMES.
translations: He respondido todas las preguntas.

Ella ha respondido al teléfono varias veces.

examples: SHE ANSWERS EMAILS ALL DAY.
HE ANSWERS THE PHONE AT WORK.
THEY ARE ANSWERING THE QUESTIONS NOW.
translations: Ella responde correos electrónicos todo el día.
Él responde al teléfono en el trabajo.
Ellos están respondiendo las preguntas ahora.

examples: I CLEAN THE HOUSE EVERY WEEKEND.
YOU CLEAN YOUR ROOM EVERY DAY.
THEY CLEAN THE OFFICE EVERY FRIDAY.
translations: Limpio la casa todos los fines de semana.
Tú limpias tu habitación todos los días.

examples: I CLEANED THE KITCHEN LAST NIGHT.
YOU CLEANED THE CAR YESTERDAY.
SHE CLEANED HER APARTMENT LAST WEEK.
translations: Limpié la cocina anoche.
Tú limpiaste el coche ayer.
Ella limpió su apartamento la semana pasada.

examples: I HAVE CLEANED THE ENTIRE HOUSE.
YOU HAVE CLEANED THE DESK.
SHE HAS CLEANED THE BATHROOM.
translations: He limpiado toda la casa.
Tú has limpiado el escritorio.

examples: SHE CLEANS THE HOUSE EVERY WEEK.
HE CLEANS HIS ROOM EVERY DAY.
THEY ARE CLEANING THE GARDEN.
translations: Ella limpia la casa todas las semanas.
Él limpia su habitación todos los días.
Ellos están limpiando el jardín.

examples: I START MY DAY WITH A CUP OF COFFEE.
YOU START YOUR WORK AT 9 A.M.

translations: Empiezo mi día con una taza de café.

examples: I STARTED A NEW PROJECT LAST MONTH.

SHE STARTED A NEW JOB LAST WEEK.

examples: I HAVE STARTED A NEW HOBBY.
YOU HAVE STARTED A NEW COURSE.
SHE HAS STARTED EXERCISING REGULARLY.
translations: He empezado un nuevo pasatiempo.

examples: SHE STARTS WORK AT 8 A.M.
HE STARTS HIS DAY WITH A RUN.
THEY ARE STARTING A NEW BUSINESS.
translations: Ella empieza a trabajar a las 8 a.m.

examples: I LOOK AT THE SKY EVERY NIGHT.
YOU LOOK FOR YOUR KEYS EVERY MORNING.
THEY LOOK AT THE STARS.

examples: I LOOKED FOR MY PHONE ALL DAY.
YOU LOOKED AT THE PICTURE.

examples: I HAVE LOOKED AT THE MAP.
YOU HAVE LOOKED THROUGH THE REPORT.
SHE HAS LOOKED FOR THE ANSWERS.

examples: SHE LOOKS AT THE CLOCK.
HE LOOKS FOR HIS BOOK.
THEY ARE LOOKING AT THE MAP.

Ellos están mirando el mapa.

examples: I WANT TO LEARN NEW THINGS.
YOU WANT TO GO ON VACATION.
THEY WANT TO EAT DINNER.
translations: Quiero aprender cosas nuevas.
Tú quieres ir de vacaciones.

examples: I WANTED TO BUY A NEW CAR.
YOU WANTED TO TRY THAT RESTAURANT.
SHE WANTED TO MEET YOU.
translations: Quería comprar un coche nuevo.
Tú querías probar ese restaurante.
Ella quería conocerte.

examples: I HAVE WANTED TO VISIT PARIS.
YOU HAVE WANTED TO CHANGE JOBS.
SHE HAS WANTED A PET FOR YEARS.

Tú has querido cambiar de trabajo.
Ella ha querido una mascota durante años.

examples: SHE WANTS TO LEAVE NOW.
HE WANTS TO EAT OUT.
THEY ARE WANTING A BREAK.

Él quiere comer fuera.
Ellos están deseando un descanso.

examples: I WAIT FOR THE BUS EVERY MORNING.
YOU WAIT FOR YOUR FRIENDS AT THE CAFE.
THEY WAIT FOR THE MOVIE TO START.
translations: Espero el autobús todas las mañanas.

examples: I WAITED FOR AN HOUR LAST NIGHT.
YOU WAITED OUTSIDE THE STORE.
SHE WAITED FOR HIS CALL.
translations: Esperé una hora anoche.

examples: I HAVE WAITED FOR THIS MOMENT.
YOU HAVE WAITED LONG ENOUGH.
SHE HAS WAITED PATIENTLY.
translations: He esperado este momento.
Tú has esperado lo suficiente.
Ella ha esperado pacientemente.

examples: SHE WAITS FOR HER TURN.
HE WAITS AT THE STATION.
THEY ARE WAITING FOR THEIR FLIGHT.

Él espera en la estación.

examples: I HELP MY FRIENDS WITH THEIR HOMEWORK.
YOU HELP YOUR FAMILY A LOT.
THEY HELP EACH OTHER IN NEED.

examples: I HELPED HER WITH THE PROJECT LAST WEEK.
YOU HELPED ME FIND MY KEYS.
SHE HELPED ORGANIZE THE EVENT.

examples: I HAVE HELPED MANY PEOPLE.
YOU HAVE HELPED TO IMPROVE THE SYSTEM.
SHE HAS HELPED WITH THE ARRANGEMENTS.

examples: SHE HELPS HER SISTER WITH HER HOMEWORK.

THEY TALK ABOUT THEIR PLANS.

SHE DANCED WITH HER FRIENDS.

examples: I HAVE DANCED IN MANY PLACES.

examples: SHE DANCES EVERY DAY.
HE DANCES AT THE CLUB.
THEY ARE DANCING AT THE FESTIVAL.

examples: I NEED TO BUY GROCERIES.
YOU NEED TO FINISH YOUR HOMEWORK.
THEY NEED HELP WITH THE PROJECT.
translations: Necesito comprar víveres.
Tú necesitas terminar tu tarea.
Ellos necesitan ayuda con el proyecto.

examples: I NEEDED A NEW COMPUTER LAST YEAR.
YOU NEEDED ASSISTANCE DURING THE EVENT.
SHE NEEDED TO LEAVE EARLY.
translations: Necesité una computadora nueva el año pasado.
Tú necesitaste asistencia durante el evento.
Ella necesitó salir temprano.

examples: I HAVE NEEDED TO REST.
YOU HAVE NEEDED A BREAK.
SHE HAS NEEDED MORE TIME.
translations: He necesitado descansar.
Tú has necesitado un descanso.
Ella ha necesitado más tiempo.

examples: SHE NEEDS TO STUDY.
HE NEEDS MORE INFORMATION.
THEY ARE NEEDING ASSISTANCE NOW.
translations: Ella necesita estudiar.
Él necesita más información.
Ellos están necesitando asistencia ahora.
